attributes.action: Stop pest control companies using poison bait stations
attributes.additional_details: Using poison bait stations is disgusting.and cruel. Which  causes unnecessary suffering.When rats and mice. eat it they go off and die. A fox or cat maybe a bird of prey will pick up the dead rodent.and get poisoned too leading to death.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliament to ban poison bait stations and make pest control companies  use non lethal methods. That won't affect other wildlife animals. Cats and the environment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about poison bait stations, but we're not sure if you just want pest control companies to be banned from using these stations, or for their use to be banned entirely. We're also not sure if you want only this type of lethal pest control method to be banned, as your petition refers to requiring pest control companies to use non-lethal methods instead.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
